hadiths.text: Amr reported:I said to 'Urwa: How long did Allah's Apostle - (ﷺ) stay in Mecca? He said: For ten years. I said: Ibn 'Abbas says (that he stayed in Mecca) for thirteen years

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ أَقَامَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بِمَكَّةَ وَالْمَدِينَةِ .
chapter.eng-name: How Long Did The Prophet (ﷺ) ft Stay In Makkah And Al-Madinah?
